analysis: The current project has a basic HTML structure with CSS and JavaScript files. The theme is intended to be cosmic and related to black holes, with animations and interactive elements. However, the current implementation lacks the full cosmic theme, animations for black hole visuals, and interactive elements. The HTML file needs to be completed with sections related to black holes, and the CSS and JavaScript files need to be updated to include the full intended theme and animations.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with the full intended dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements.
Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.
Fix the syntax errors in the showSlide function and complete the JavaScript content to ensure all functions are properly implemented.
